committed"},"didReveal(address,uint256)":{"details":"Checks if user has revealed for specified poll","params":{"_pollID":"Integer identifier associated with target poll","_voter":"Address of user to poll","params":{"_pollID":"Integer identifier associated with target poll","_voter":"Address of user to check against"},"return":"Bytes32 hash property attached to target poll"},"getLastNode(address)":{"details":"Gets top element of sorted poll-linked-list","params":{"_voter":"Address of user to check against"},"return":"Integer identifier to poll with maximum number bloc"},"return":"correctVotes    Number of tokens voted for winning option"},"getNumTokens(address,uint256)":{"details":"Wrapper for getAttribute with attrName=\"numTokens\"","params":{"_pollID":"Integer identifier associated with target poll","_voter":"Address of user to check against"},"return":"Number of tokens committed to poll in sorted poll-linked-list"},"getTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOption(uint256)":{"details":"Gets the total winning votes for reward distribution purposes","params":{"_pollID":"Integer identifier associated with target poll"},"return":"Total number of votes committed to the winning option for specified poll"},"init(address)":{"details":"Initializer. Can only be called once.","params":{"_token":"The address where the ERC20 token contract is deployed"}},"isExpired(uint256)":{"details":"Checks if an expiration date has been passed"},"isPassed(uint256)":{"details":"Check if votesFor out of totalVotes exceeds votesQuorum (requires pollEnded)","params":{"_pollID":"Integer identifier associated with target pollID"},"requestVotingRights(uint256)":{"details":"Assumes that msg.sender has approved voting contract to spend on their behalf","params":{"_numTokens":"The number of votingTokens desired in poll"}},"revealVote(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_pollID":"Integer identifier associated with target poll","_salt":"Secret number used to generate commitHash for associated sort"},"withdrawVotingRights(uint256)":{"params":{"_numTokens":"The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights"}}},"title":"Partial-Lock-Commit-Reveal Voting scheme with ERC20 nodes.name: isExpired
attrUUID

devdoc.author: Team: Aspyn Palatnick, Cem Ozer, Yorke Rhodes

attrUUID(address,uint256).details: Generates an identifier which associates a user and a poll together

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

attrUUID(address,uint256).return: UUID Hash which is deterministic from _user and _pollID

commitPeriodActive(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for the specified poll's commitEndDate

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

commitPeriodActive(uint256).return: Boolean indication of isCommitPeriodActive for target poll

params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the target poll
params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._prevPollID: The ID of the poll that the user has voted the maximum number of tokens in which is still less than or equal to numTokens
params._secretHash: Commit keccak256 hash of voter's choice and salt (tightly packed in this order)

params._numsTokens: Array of numbers of tokens to be committed towards the target polls
params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with target polls
params._prevPollIDs: Array of IDs of the polls that the user has voted the maximum number of tokens in which is still less than or equal to numTokens
params._secretHashes: Array of commit keccak256 hashes of voter's choices and salts (tightly packed in this order)

didCommit(address,uint256).details: Checks if user has committed for specified poll

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

didCommit(address,uint256).return: Boolean indication of whether user has committed

didReveal(address,uint256).details: Checks if user has revealed for specified poll

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

didReveal(address,uint256).return: Boolean indication of whether user has revealed

getCommitHash(address,uint256).details: Gets the bytes32 commitHash property of target poll

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

getCommitHash(address,uint256).return: Bytes32 hash property attached to target poll

getLastNode(address).details: Gets top element of sorted poll-linked-list

params._voter: Address of user to check against

getLastNode(address).return: Integer identifier to poll with maximum number of tokens committed to it

getLockedTokens(address).details: Gets the numTokens property of getLastNode

params._voter: Address of user to check against

getLockedTokens(address).return: Maximum number of tokens committed in poll specified

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of voter who voted in the majority bloc

getNumPassingTokens(address,uint256).return: correctVotes    Number of tokens voted for winning option

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._voter: Address of user to check against

getNumTokens(address,uint256).return: Number of tokens committed to poll in sorted poll-linked-list

getTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOption(u.details: Gets the total winning votes for reward distribution purposes

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

getTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOption(u.return: Total number of votes committed to the winning option for specified poll

init(address).details: Initializer. Can only be called once.

params._token: The address where the ERC20 token contract is deployed

isExpired(uint256).details: Checks if an expiration date has been reached

params._terminationDate: Integer timestamp of date to compare current timestamp with

isExpired(uint256).return: expired Boolean indication of whether the terminationDate has passed

isPassed(uint256).details: Check if votesFor out of totalVotes exceeds votesQuorum (requires pollEnded)

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

pollEnded(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for specified poll's revealEndDate
pollEnded(uint256).return: Boolean indication of whether polling period is over

params._pollID: The pollID whose existance is to be evaluated.

pollExists(uint256).return: Boolean Indicates whether a poll exists for the provided pollID

requestVotingRights(uint256).details: Assumes that msg.sender has approved voting contract to spend on their behalf

params._numTokens: The number of votingTokens desired in exchange for ERC20 tokens

rescueTokens(uint256).details: Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed vote where poll has ended

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with the target poll

rescueTokensInMultiplePolls(uint256[]).details: Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed votes where polls have ended

params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with the target pollsh

revealPeriodActive(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for the specified poll's revealEndDate

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._salt: Secret number used to generate commitHash for associated poll
params._voteOption: Vote choice used to generate commitHash for associated poll

params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with target polls
params._salts: Array of secret numbers used to generate commitHashes for associated polls
params._voteOptions: Array of vote choices used to generate commitHashes for associated polls

startPoll(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Initiates a poll with canonical configured parameters at pollID emitted by PollCreated event

params._commitDuration: Length of desired commit period in seconds
params._revealDuration: Length of desired reveal period in seconds
params._voteQuorum: Type of majority (out of 100) that is necessary for poll to be successful

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Compares previous and next poll's committed tokens for sorting purposes

params._nextID: Integer identifier associated with next poll in sorted order
params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the poll (used for sorting)
params._prevID: Integer identifier associated with previous poll in sorted order
params._voter: Address of user to check DLL position for

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.return: valid Boolean indication of if the specified position maintains the sort

params._numTokens: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights

devdoc.title: Partial-Lock-Commit-Reveal Voting scheme with ERC20 tokens

commitPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the commit period is still active for the specified poll

commitVote(uint256,bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Commits vote using hash of choice and secret salt to conceal vote until reveal

commitVotes(uint256[],bytes32[],uint256[.notice: Commits votes using hashes of choices and secret salts to conceal votes until reveal

requestVotingRights(uint256).notice: Loads _numTokens ERC20 tokens into the voting contract for one-to-one voting rights

revealPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the reveal period is still active for the specified poll

revealVote(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Reveals vote with choice and secret salt used in generating commitHash to attribute committed tokens

revealVotes(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[.notice: Reveals multiple votes with choices and secret salts used in generating commitHashes to attribute committed tokens

withdrawVotingRights(uint256).notice: Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights
